title: Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles (PKD 45)
paragraphs: Supporting activity connected with the core transport business.
Trade in selected parts and accessories for heavy trucks and trailers used in international transport.
Organisation of repair and service works for own fleet and, when possible, for partner companies.
points: Coordination of service and repair works with trusted workshops along main routes.
Procurement of spare parts with focus on safety-critical components.
Technical support for breakdowns during international routes.
